creator: mbenson@apache.org
text:
I can't see any manual page for it, anyway... also, its javadoc says 
category=optional (which is why I selected optional tasks in this report), but 
I can't see that it has any dependencies that would keep it out of core tasks.

I am writing the manual page for <nice>...

Nice lives in oata.taskdefs; however it also has the tag
 * @ant.task name="Nice" category="optional"

Should the category be changed?  Also, the current behavior of <nice> appears 
to be nothing whatsoever if no attributes are set.  Should a BuildException be 
thrown in this case?
creator: mbenson@apache.org
